short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Latest Music Updates Default Search allows you to configure your default search engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Latest Music Updates Default Search is a handy high-tech Chrome extension that allows you to easily boost your search experience by providing search results powered by Yahoo.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install " Latest Music Updates Default Search" Chrome extension and hereby agree to change default search to Latest Music Updates Default Search provided by the service, and I agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

How to use:
Type search term into the Google Chrome Omnibox. The Latest Music Updates Search will provide excellent custom search results powered by Yahoo.
For more technical details you can read about Google Chrome API for Google Chrome Extensions.

You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.

Visit our website at https://latestmusicupdates.com/
Read more about us: https://latestmusicupdates.com/about-search/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://latestmusicupdates.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://latestmusicupdates.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://latestmusicupdates.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/

If at any point after installing you feel that Latest Music Updates Default Search is not right for you, don't worry about it! There are two simple ways to uninstall the extension.

Removal Instructions One:
Step 1: Right click on the extension in the top right corner of your browser.
Step 2: Click 'Remove'
Or
Removal Instructions Two:
Step 1: Click on the three dots/horizontal lines icon in the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
Step 2: Go to "Settings".
Step 3: On the left-hand side, click on 'Extensions'
Step 4: Find the extension that you wish to remove and click the 'Remove' button.
Step 5: The extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
